scripts.bundle-vendor: esbuild node_modules/sync-fetch/index.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=priv/vendor/sync-fetch.cjs && esbuild node_modules/sync-fetch/worker.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=priv/vendor/worker.js && cp node_modules/@takumi-rs/wasm/pkg/takumi_wasm.js priv/vendor/ && cp node_modules/@takumi-rs/wasm/pkg/takumi_wasm_bg.wasm priv/vendor/
